- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug Fix
- [x] Improvement
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Documentation

## Description

With this PR I'm converting the previously used `Setting`  to an html form, this way I'm gaining control over the style of the form and also support other forms of submitting the form like by pressing enter. This should make the workflow of using the plugin more smooth as you don't need to manually click on the search button anymore.

## Related Tickets & Documents

- Closes #5 #6
